other_tests.findings: Showed acid-fast bacilli and grew Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
Revealed Wuchereria bancrofti, corresponding to positive filariasis serologies.
Indicated human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection, with a CD4 count of 84 cells/mm3 and viral load of 7.36 million copies/mL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CD4 count increased to 174 cells/mm3, and viral load fell to 4150 copies/mL within 4 weeks of starting therapy.
